title: Bai Bian Xiao Ba season2
synopsis: This film continues the content of the previous one, telling that the Rainbow Town Sunshine Kindergarten is ushering in a new semester. Goethe continues to be responsible for the work of transporting children to and from school. Although Didi and their friends have grown up, they have new problems. There is also an endless stream. Emotion management still needs the guidance and help of Goethe, teachers and parents to learn more ways to manage emotions. (translated from iqiyi)
